title: ARGGH!
description: Hunter Spector, spectre hunter, travels the country hunting ghosts for the Academy of Really Good Ghost Hunters!
quote: I’m picking up something on my ARGGH! ghost detector.
altHero: Hunter Spector looking at his ghost detecter
alt1: silhouette of Hunter in a doorway at the top of stairs
alt3: open ghost trap with green ghost energy billowing out of it
alt4: Hunter crawling through some neon green goo on the floor
